verses.verse: וַנֵּ֜פֶן <WH6437> Then we turned וַנִּסַּ֤ע <WH5265> and took our journey הַמִּדְבָּ֙רָה֙ <WH4057> into the wilderness דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way יַם־ <WH3220> sea ס֔וּף <WH5488> of the Red כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me וַנָּ֥סָב <WH5437> unto me and we compassed אֶת־ <WH853> הַר־ <WH2022> mount שֵׂעִ֖יר <WH8165> Seir יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> days רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> many ס
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> unto me saying
רַב־ <WH7227> long enough לָכֶ֕ם סֹ֖ב <WH5437> Ye have compassed אֶת־ <WH853> הָהָ֣ר <WH2022> this mountain הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this פְּנ֥וּ <WH6437> turn לָכֶ֖ם צָפֹֽנָה׃ <WH6828> you northward

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֮ <WH5971> thou the people צַ֣ו <WH6680> And command לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> You עֹֽבְרִ֗ים <WH5674> Ye [are] to pass בִּגְבוּל֙ <WH1366> through the coast אֲחֵיכֶ֣ם <WH251> of your brethren בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> of Esau הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> which dwell בְּשֵׂעִ֑יר <WH8165> in Seir וְיִֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> and they shall be afraid מִכֶּ֔ם <WH4480> at וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH8104> heed מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> of you take ye good

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתְגָּר֣וּ <WH1624> Meddle בָ֔ם כִּ֠י <WH3588> because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אֶתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> not with them for I will not give לָכֶם֙ מֵֽאַרְצָ֔ם <WH776> you of their land עַ֖ד <WH5704> even מִדְרַ֣ךְ <WH4096> breadth כַּף־ <WH3709> branch רָ֑גֶל <WH7272> no not so much as a foot כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because יְרֻשָּׁ֣ה <WH3425> [for] a possession לְעֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> unto Esau נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> because I have given אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֥ר <WH2022> mount שֵׂעִֽיר׃ <WH8165> Seir

אֹ֣כֶל <WH400> meat תִּשְׁבְּר֧וּ <WH7666> Ye shall buy מֵֽאִתָּ֛ם <WH853> בַּכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> of them for money וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֑ם <WH398> that ye may eat וְגַם־ <WH1571> shall also מַ֜יִם <WH4325> water תִּכְר֧וּ <WH3739> and ye shall also buy מֵאִתָּ֛ם <WH853> בַּכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> of them for money וּשְׁתִיתֶֽם׃ <WH8354> that ye may drink

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God בֵּֽרַכְךָ֗ <WH1288> hath blessed בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> thee in all the works יָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> of thy hand יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> he knoweth לֶכְתְּךָ֔ <WH1980> your wanderings אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּדְבָּ֥ר <WH4057> wilderness הַגָּדֹ֖ל <WH1419> through this great הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this זֶ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> These אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> these forty שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> years יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with לֹ֥א <WH3808> have not חָסַ֖רְתָּ <WH2637> [hath been] with thee thou hast lacked דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> nothing

וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֞ר <WH5674> And when we passed מֵאֵ֧ת <WH854> for אַחֵ֣ינוּ <WH251> by from our brethren בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children עֵשָׂ֗ו <WH6215> of Esau הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <WH3427> which dwelt בְּשֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> in Seir מִדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> through the way הָֽעֲרָבָ֔ה <WH6160> of the plain מֵאֵילַ֖ת <WH359> from Elath וּמֵעֶצְיֹ֣ן גָּ֑בֶר <WH6100> and from Eziongaber ס וַנֵּ֙פֶן֙ <WH6437> we turned וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֔ר <WH5674> and passed דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> of the wilderness מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH408> nor תָּ֙צַר֙ <WH6696> unto me Distress אֶת־ <WH853> מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> not the Moabites וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תִּתְגָּ֥ר <WH1624> neither contend בָּ֖ם מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> with them in battle כִּ֠י <WH3588> because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אֶתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> for I will not give לְךָ֤ מֵֽאַרְצוֹ֙ <WH776> thee of their land יְרֻשָּׁ֔ה <WH3425> [for] a possession כִּ֣י <WH3588> because לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> unto the children ל֔וֹט <WH3876> of Lot נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> because I have given אֶת־ <WH853> עָ֖ר <WH6144> Ar יְרֻשָּׁה׃ <WH3425> [for] a possession

הָאֵמִ֥ים <WH368> The Emims לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> therein in times past יָ֣שְׁבוּ <WH3427> dwelt בָ֑הּ עַ֣ם <WH5971> a people גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> great וְרַ֛ב <WH7227> and many וָרָ֖ם <WH7311> and tall כָּעֲנָקִֽים׃ <WH6062> as the Anakims

רְפָאִ֛ים <WH7497> giants יֵחָשְׁב֥וּ <WH2803> also were accounted אַף־ <WH637> are also הֵ֖ם <WH1992> Which כָּעֲנָקִ֑ים <WH6062> as the Anakims וְהַמֹּ֣אָבִ֔ים <WH4125> but the Moabites יִקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> call לָהֶ֖ם אֵמִֽים׃ <WH368> them Emims

וּבְשֵׂעִ֞יר <WH8165> in Seir יָשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> also dwelt הַחֹרִים֮ <WH2752> The Horims לְפָנִים֒ <WH6440> beforetime וּבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> but the children עֵשָׂ֣ו <WH6215> of Esau יִֽירָשׁ֗וּם <WH3423> succeeded וַיַּשְׁמִידוּם֙ <WH8045> them when they had destroyed מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> them from before וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> them and dwelt תַּחְתָּ֑ם <WH8478> their place כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> did יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> in their stead as Israel לְאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> unto the land יְרֻשָּׁת֔וֹ <WH3425> of his possession אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> gave יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לָהֶֽם׃

עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now קֻ֛מוּ <WH6965> Now rise up וְעִבְר֥וּ <WH5674> [said I] and get you over לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> נַ֣חַל <WH5158> the brook זָ֑רֶד <WH2218> Zered וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> And we went over אֶת־ <WH853> נַ֥חַל <WH5158> the brook זָֽרֶד׃ <WH2218> Zered

וְהַיָּמִ֞ים <WH3117> And the space אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that הָלַ֣כְנוּ ׀ <WH1980> in which we came מִקָּדֵ֣שׁ בַּרְנֵ֗עַ <WH6947> from Kadeshbarnea עַ֤ד <WH5704> until אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָבַ֙רְנוּ֙ <WH5674> until we were come over אֶת־ <WH853> נַ֣חַל <WH5158> the brook זֶ֔רֶד <WH2218> Zered שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> [was] thirty וּשְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <WH8083> and eight שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years עַד־ <WH5704> until תֹּ֨ם <WH8552> were wasted out כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדּ֜וֹר <WH1755> until all the generation אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> of the men הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> of war מִקֶּ֣רֶב <WH7130> from among הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> the host כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD לָהֶֽם׃

וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> Moreover יַד־ <WH3027> For indeed the hand יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD הָ֣יְתָה <WH1961> become בָּ֔ם לְהֻמָּ֖ם <WH2000> was against them to destroy מִקֶּ֣רֶב <WH7130> them from among הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> the host עַ֖ד <WH5704> until תֻּמָּֽם׃ <WH8552> until they were consumed

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> came כַאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after תַּ֜מּוּ <WH8552> were consumed כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַנְשֵׁ֧י <WH582> So it came to pass when all the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <WH4421> of war לָמ֖וּת <WH4191> and dead מִקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> from among הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> That the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> unto me saying
אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> you עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> Thou art to pass over הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> this day אֶת־ <WH853> גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> the coast מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab אֶת־ <WH853> עָֽר׃ <WH6144> through Ar

וְקָרַבְתָּ֗ <WH7126> And [when] thou comest nigh מ֚וּל <WH4136> over against בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon אַל־ <WH408> nor תְּצֻרֵ֖ם <WH6696> distress וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תִּתְגָּ֣ר <WH1624> them not nor meddle בָּ֑ם כִּ֣י <WH3588> because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אֶ֠תֵּן <WH5414> with them for I will not give מֵאֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> thee of the land בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֤וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon לְךָ֙ יְרֻשָּׁ֔ה <WH3425> [any] possession כִּ֥י <WH3588> because לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> it unto the children ל֖וֹט <WH3876> of Lot נְתַתִּ֥יהָ <WH5414> because I have given יְרֻשָּֽׁה׃ <WH3425> [for] a possession

אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> a land רְפָאִ֥ים <WH7497> of giants תֵּחָשֵׁ֖ב <WH2803> (That also was accounted אַף־ <WH637> is also הִ֑וא רְפָאִ֤ים <WH7497> giants יָֽשְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> dwelt בָהּ֙ לְפָנִ֔ים <WH6440> therein in old time וְהָֽעַמֹּנִ֔ים <WH5984> and the Ammonites יִקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> call לָהֶ֖ם זַמְזֻמִּֽים׃ <WH2157> them Zamzummims

עַ֣ם <WH5971> A people גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> great וְרַ֛ב <WH7227> and many וָרָ֖ם <WH7311> and tall כָּעֲנָקִ֑ים <WH6062> as the Anakims וַיַּשְׁמִידֵ֤ם <WH8045> destroyed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> but the LORD מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> them before וַיִּירָשֻׁ֖ם <WH3423> them and they succeeded וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> them and dwelt תַחְתָּֽם׃ <WH8478> their place

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> when עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> As he did לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> to the children עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> of Esau הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> which dwelt בְּשֵׂעִ֑יר <WH8165> in Seir אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> when הִשְׁמִ֤יד <WH8045> when he destroyed אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֹרִי֙ <WH2752> the Horims מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> from before וַיִּֽירָשֻׁם֙ <WH3423> them and they succeeded וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> them and dwelt תַחְתָּ֔ם <WH8478> their place עַ֖ד <WH5704> even הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> in their stead even unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וְהָֽעַוִּ֛ים <WH5757> Avims הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> which dwelt בַּחֲצֵרִ֖ים <WH2699> in Hazerim עַד־ <WH5704> far עַזָּ֑ה <WH5804> [even] unto Azzah כַּפְתֹּרִים֙ <WH3732> the Caphtorims הַיֹּצְאִ֣ים <WH3318> which came forth מִכַּפְתּ֔וֹר <WH3731> out of Caphtor הִשְׁמִידֻ֖ם <WH8045> destroyed וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> them and dwelt תַחְתָּֽם׃ <WH8478> Thahash

ק֣וּמוּ <WH6965> Rise ye up סְּע֗וּ <WH5265> take your journey וְעִבְרוּ֮ <WH5674> and pass over אֶת־ <WH853> נַ֣חַל <WH5158> the river אַרְנֹן֒ <WH769> Arnon רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> behold נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> I have given בְ֠יָדְךָ <WH3027> into thine hand אֶת־ <WH853> סִיחֹ֨ן <WH5511> Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king חֶשְׁבּ֧וֹן <WH2809> of Heshbon הָֽאֱמֹרִ֛י <WH567> the Amorite וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצ֖וֹ <WH776> and his land הָחֵ֣ל <WH2490> begin רָ֑שׁ <WH3423> to possess וְהִתְגָּ֥ר <WH1624> [it] and contend בּ֖וֹ מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> with him in battle

הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> This day הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> This אָחֵל֙ <WH2490> will I begin תֵּ֤ת <WH5414> to put פַּחְדְּךָ֙ <WH6343> the dread וְיִרְאָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH3374> of thee and the fear עַל־ <WH5921> because פְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> because of thee הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> the peoples תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under כָּל־ <WH3605> everywhere הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> [that are] under the whole heaven אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יִשְׁמְעוּן֙ <WH8085> who shall hear שִׁמְעֲךָ֔ <WH8088> report וְרָגְז֥וּ <WH7264> of thee and shall tremble וְחָל֖וּ <WH2342> and be in anguish מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> accept

וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> And I sent מַלְאָכִים֙ <WH4397> messengers מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> out of the wilderness קְדֵמ֔וֹת <WH6932> of Kedemoth אֶל־ <WH413> to סִיח֖וֹן <WH5511> unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> of Heshbon דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> with words שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> of peace לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אֶעְבְּרָ֣ה <WH5674> Let me pass בְאַרְצֶ֔ךָ <WH776> through thy land בַּדֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> the highway בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the highway אֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> will travel לֹ֥א <WH3808> I will not אָס֖וּר <WH5493> I will neither turn יָמִ֥ין <WH3225> unto the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <WH8040> nor to the left

אֹ֣כֶל <WH400> me meat בַּכֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> for money תַּשְׁבִּרֵ֙נִי֙ <WH7666> Thou shalt sell וְאָכַ֔לְתִּי <WH398> that I may eat וּמַ֛יִם <WH4325> me water בַּכֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> for money תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and give לִ֖י וְשָׁתִ֑יתִי <WH8354> that I may drink רַ֖ק <WH7535> but אֶעְבְּרָ֥ה <WH5674> only I will pass through בְרַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> on my feet
